text: Without rewards  enroll directly with the respective company.With rewards but with fee  CardUp.
How does CardUp works? ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜‚Fee meaning?If my insurance is $5K?

You pay a fee to CardUp to make the payment on your behalf and earn rewards for the eligible credit card it charges to.You have only a very small selection of cards which usually gives poor rewards for insurance. CardUp bypasses that to give better rewards for a fee.
